n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i - 1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if x[i] != x[i - 1] and x[i] != x[i - 1] + 1:
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = max(x) - min(x) + 2
max_houses = n

for i in range(n):
    if x[i] == 1:
        max_houses -= 1
    if x[i] == n - 1:
        max_houses -= 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = 1
max_houses = 1

for i in range(1, n):
    if x[i] != x[i-1]:
        min_houses += 1
    if x[i] != x[i-1] and x[i] != x[i-2] + 1:
        max_houses += 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)


n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = max(x) - min(x)
max_houses = n - 1

for i in range(n):
    if x[i] == 1 or x[i] == n:
        max_houses -= 2

print(min_houses + 1, max_houses)

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

min_houses = max(x) - min(x) + 1 # max - min + 1
max_houses = n # n

for i in range(n):
    if x[i] == 1: # if x[i] = 1
        max_houses -= 1
    if x[i] == n: # if x[i] = n
        max_houses -= 1

print(min_houses, max_houses)
n = int(input())
s = input()


ans = 0
for i in range(1, n):
    if s[i] == s[i - 1]:
        ans += 1

print(ans)
